website_summaries.verdict: A great value travel storage set for organizing toiletries or makeup.
pros: The set comes with three different sized zippered bags
They are all machine washable and feature a convenient carrying loop
Ripstop nylon construction ensures the bags are built to last
cons: Narrow opening makes it hard to pack certain items inside

customer_reviews.title: These bags are made from the same great material as as the Baggu bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags are made from the same great material as as the Baggu bags..and I have tons of them. However, these bags really don't open up very well and then ends do not expand as the picture shows they do. They are deep and will hold quite a bit, but the opening is very narrow making it difficult to put things in.
customer_reviews.author: Bryleighs Chichi

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described and as desired.
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome. They're made from a durable, lightweight rip-stop fabric. I was worried it would be fragile, but it's not! The loop is very secure, and I can lift a packed large bag with impunity. They expand out exactly as shown in the picture. It can be awkward with the zipper down the side and how the folds open up, but these ABSOLUTELY fit way more than you'd think in there! They pack down wonderfully small and very foldable. I liked them so much, I bought several more sets. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tlvan

customer_reviews.title: Useful for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Super useful and handy bags for traveling! I usually fill one with toiletries and pack the other two rolled-up in my suitcase. During the trip I can hang the toiletries bag in a hotel bathroom, and I can use the spare bags for holding dirty clothes, shoes, and other knick-knacks. They're pretty durable and hold a surprising amount.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags. The light fabric makes them so easy to fill and stuff into a bag. I carry my knitting to keep it clean on the go.
customer_reviews.author: CMurdock

customer_reviews.title: I have also found the smaller sizes useful for shopping as they collapse conveniently into my handbag ...
customer_reviews.text: While I was expecting a stripe (perhaps my monitor displayed the image inaccurately), these Baggu bags are exactly what I was looking for: lightweight, highly portable, and versatile. They are my go-to bags for shoes whenever I travel. I have also found the smaller sizes useful for shopping as they collapse conveniently into my handbag and can carry odd sized items (cosmetics) well. Love Baggu!
customer_reviews.author: C. Enright

customer_reviews.title: Diaper bag game changer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Head thinggs helped me to organize my diaper bag and with the loop at the end make t very easy to quickly grab. I love the prints also (I got the palm) very eye catching!! I love Baggu!
customer_reviews.author: Trendspotter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for organizing luggage
customer_reviews.text: Great bags for organizing luggage. The large bag was perfect for my gym shoes. I put socks and underwear in the medium bag, and miscellaneous cords in the small bag. Great set that seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: ... smaller ones in my purse and it works so great! All of the toiletry type stuff goes in ...
customer_reviews.text: I keep the two smaller ones in my purse and it works so great! All of the toiletry type stuff goes in one (hand sanitizer, bandaid, lipstick, etc) and checks/pen in another. I bought them for travel but am thinking I may need to get another set.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great Sizes
customer_reviews.text: Useful size bags for holding baby toys, stroller rain guard & other baby items. Bags are the perfect size to fit into diaper bag pockets. The bags are well made. I tried to find cheaper versions, but they do not make them this size. I ended up buying 2 sets of these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Karen T

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Bought four sets to give as gifts. Great for travel and keeping things organized. Super lightweight yet very sturdy. Folds back up like an envelope for storage.
customer_reviews.author: sofia

customer_reviews.title: Great for Moms!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far my favorite bags to use when I travel. They are lightweight and can easily hold all of my necessities - plus they’re so darn cute. They also make a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Versatile bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great for organizing travel items. I keep one in my purse to store extra disposable face masks, keeping them clean and ready.
customer_reviews.author: kamagain

customer_reviews.title: Everything just as good as expected ;)
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is thin but tough, just as it is on regular Baggu bags. Pattern as beautiful as shown on picture. Useful to help you organise. Exactly what I expected! Tip : Avoid items with sharp pointy corners if you want to make it last ;) If you do so, it won't tear but the fabric will have a used look. Unless you love that style , then go go go!
customer_reviews.author: Anna M.

customer_reviews.title: I love these bags
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! I recently used them on a weekend trip and really like how lightweight they are, the easy zipper tops, the fabric, and the designs. Having different sizes is a plus. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Adams

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: These were as cute and useful as I hoped they would be! Lightweight & so fun!
customer_reviews.author: P Helms

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The various sizes are perfect. The large one is awesome for my family
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: I use these to help keep my diaper bag organized. These also come in handy when I have to cart around dirty baby clothes/burp cloths!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Winter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gift, for my daughter, uses it always for travel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good, but not versatile
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and I love the print. They are okay for packing cubes, useful for socks or underwear. However they don’t work well for cosmetics as the sides fall when the zip is open. They’re good just not as versatile as other styles and designs of the structure.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Hart

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: A heavy traveller, I find these bags really useful and practical to organise my suitcase. Also use them to carry my knitting projects. The zips are full proof, the bags are very durable and light. I bought the mid sized one years ago and like it so much, I bought the set.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Find myself using for everything— toys, toiletries, breast pump parts. Great quality and like the three different sizes. The large one holds a ton
customer_reviews.author: Molly K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids supplies, travel and pool
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! We used them for extra clothes for my kids when traveling, toiletries, and for sunscreens and bug sprays. Cute, easy to find in your beach bag, easy to clean and quality. A great price for how much we will use them!
customer_reviews.author: Ann W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Great for trips! Used to organize chargers, cords, beauty products, even fits my large round brush!
customer_reviews.author: dapper_dame

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I use the medium sized one for my lunch for school, the small one for make up, and the big one for toiletries when I travel! So simple!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Carter

customer_reviews.title: Made from the same great quality as their shopping bags
customer_reviews.text: These are made from the same quality fabric as their shopping bags but just too small for me to use clothing bags or shoe bags for luggage. They would be great for toiletries, makeup and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: The Mermaid

product_meta.title: BAGGU 3D Zip Set, Expandable Nylon Zip Pouch 3 Pack For Travel And Organization, Animal Friends
